page.title: 05Farming in Ardleigh
page.content: Block 06040228 is a mainly farming area with 75 small holdings,6 orchards 1 vineyard,1 pig & 1 poultry farm and 6 arable farms. {Mr.P.Moorhouse}owns{Badley Hall } and{Waterhouse Farms.}On the{240 acres he grows wheat,barley and potatoes. Most{wheat}is for{animal feed } {compounds}but some is for{seed. } The high quality{malting barley}is sent up North for brewing. Ardleigh land is good for growing barley. All the{potatoes}grown are for{seed. They are{Desiree,}a red skinned main crop potato. They will be chitted and kept warm all the winter and sown next March. He has a{Pedigree Flock of Suffolk {Sheep}and other{breeding rams.}The sheep are due to lamb on 1st.January. He has some{Pedigree Friesian calves in the yards for fattening.
